Articles.Content:
Will there be a way or is there a way now to get more custom shortcuts. I'm assuming Ctrl and Left-Shift are used atm. But what about alt/Right-Shift and the 1-0 keys. Doubling the ammount of base customization keys would be extremely helpful. And I would think easy to implement. Or are there some shortcuts in the way atm?

And while your at it what about the same for all current non custom shortcuts. Alt+B, Alt+U, Alt+Mouse click abort, etc. You could have a second version of each custom one for special operations. This would also take loads of things off of the 1-0 custom keys and give a huge amount of range to ship shortcuts.

Keys:

Current:

Abort: Mouse click Abort

Lights: U

Gears: G

Breaks: B (tap only)

Customs: 1-0

New Keys:

Abort2: Alt+Mouse click Abort

Lights2: Alt+U

Gears2: Alt+G

Breaks2: Alt+B (Toggle Hard On)

Customs2: Alt+1-0

You could also add this to other things like V or C keys for views and add more view options or cycling back and forth depending on current setup.

If any of this isn't possible now will it be after the 1.1 release. Or is it already planned by chance?

I guess this is more of a suggestion at this point. But what other shortcut keys be useful and as already asked what ones are planned if any. And is this possible?

Edited October 18, 2015 by Arugela
